title: Is Christine Blassie Ford's lawyer the vice president of the "Urg box of Soros v. Cavanaugh"?
subtitle: Violent stories linking an organization where Debra Katz acts as Vice-President tell only part of the story.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: Counsel for Christine Blassie Ford, Debra Katz, acting as Vice-President of a "Sorros-funded organization" opposes the confirmation by the Supreme Court of Brett Cavanaugh.
